entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 6:26 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:26 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
